errors.error_description: The instructions specify an outdated version of Node.js (v10.x), which may cause `npm install` to fail due to incompatibility with modern frontend dependencies.
correction_candidates: The instructions should recommend using a recent LTS Node.js version (e.g., 18.x or higher).
Run `npm install --legacy-peer-deps` to ignore version conflicts.
Remove the Node.js version requirement entirely.
Use `yarn` instead of `npm` as it handles versioning better.
errors.golden_answer: The instructions should recommend using a recent LTS Node.js version (e.g., 18.x or higher).
